text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Dog and pony show to deflect the 140k dead Americans. Your fucked up Covid-19 response has killed too many, market is shit, record high temps- & you still deny science & facts. Fuck you shit show. #VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare #TrumpFailsAmerica
